definition: fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The new hunter will be a blue bar position focused on the value of 100 fields.
sentences.chinese: 新的獵人藍條位置將是一個100的集中值欄位。

sentences.english: A simple one-column, tableless, fluid width administration theme.
sentences.chinese: 單欄位，無表格，寬度可伸展的後臺版型。

sentences.english: You can provide extra wrong answers by giving an answer with a blank question.
sentences.chinese: 額外的答案可以利用在試題欄位保留空白來做。

sentences.english: The parameter problem message includes the pointer field in the header.
sentences.chinese: 參數問題訊息包括在表頭內的指標欄位。

sentences.english: The classes contain fields that have different declared accessibilities.
sentences.chinese: 這些類別包含具有不同宣告存取範圍的欄位。

sentences.english: To do that, click on the product which you wish to mark and fill one of these two fields necessary to the traceability.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想追朔那點擊產品標明和填入這二個欄位。

sentences.english: Please photocopy this form for more entries.
sentences.chinese: 如欄位不夠請影印本表格。

sentences.english: Relabel the reporting reference name of the field in conflict.
sentences.chinese: 重新標示發生衝突之欄位的報告參考名稱。

sentences.english: Lists the classes and methods used to define fields for dynamic types.
sentences.chinese: 列出爲動態型別定義欄位所用的類別和方法。

sentences.english: Use this field to enter an arbitrary static signature.
sentences.chinese: 使用此欄位可輸入任意的靜態簽名。

sentences.english: Fields use regular expressions syntax, case-insensitive.
sentences.chinese: 欄位使用正規表示式語法且大小寫相異。

sentences.english: Require the value of a string field to match a pattern.
sentences.chinese: 要求字串欄位的值必須符合模式。

sentences.english: The maximum length of the field in characters.
Attach:viewform. jpg Previous section explains the different types of fields found in the above form.
sentences.chinese: 上一節中說明了上面這個表單中出現的各種類型欄位。

sentences.english: Setting autonumber requires primary key to be set for current field.
sentences.chinese: 當前欄位必須設爲主鍵才能設定自動編號。

definition: to transfer (for a specific purpose)/to allocate/(computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)
to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
